findings.title: Password Fields Captured in DOM Snapshots
findings.issue: Password field values are captured in DOM snapshots and transmitted to agents. The value attribute may be present in the serialized DOM.
findings.suggested_fix: Sanitize password inputs by replacing values with mask characters (••••••••) before serialization.
questions: Should we mask ALL password fields or only specific patterns?
Should this be combined with credit card masking (F-002)?

findings.title: Credit Card and Sensitive Data Also Captured
findings.issue: Credit card fields, personal data, and session tokens visible on page are captured in DOM snapshots. PCI compliance and privacy risk.
findings.suggested_fix: Extend sanitization to mask input[type='tel'], input[autocomplete='cc-number'], and elements with data-sensitive='true'.
questions: Should we use allowlist (opt-in for capture) or blocklist (opt-out) approach?
What other field types should be auto-masked?

findings.title: No Visitor Opt-Out for Co-Browse
findings.issue: Visitors have no control over screen sharing during calls. Co-browse is automatic with no toggle. May violate privacy expectations or GDPR.
findings.suggested_fix: Add organization-level setting to enable/disable co-browse feature entirely.
questions: Should visitors have a per-call toggle, or is org-level disable enough?
Should co-browse be opt-in or opt-out by default?

findings.title: No Server-Side Pagination for Historical Data
findings.issue: All call logs are fetched client-side. For orgs with 10k+ calls, this will cause performance issues and slow page loads.
findings.suggested_fix: Implement server-side pagination with cursor-based navigation. Limit initial fetch to 100 records.
questions: What's the expected max call volume per org?
Should we add date-range filters to limit data fetched?

findings.title: Missing Data Retention Policy Enforcement
findings.issue: Data retention is documented but not enforced. Orgs can set 30-day retention but recordings/logs persist indefinitely.
findings.suggested_fix: Implement scheduled job to delete data older than org's retention setting. Add clear warning when reducing retention.
questions: Should deletion be immediate when retention is reduced, or have a grace period?
Should we notify users before scheduled deletions?

findings.title: Cancelled Calls Have No Audit Trail
findings.issue: When a call is cancelled before connecting, no record is kept. This loses data for analytics and troubleshooting.
findings.suggested_fix: Log cancelled calls with reason code (timeout, visitor left, agent declined, etc.).
questions: Is this actually needed for analytics?
Should cancelled calls count toward agent metrics?

findings.title: Email Send Failure Is Silent
findings.issue: If Resend API fails to send invite email, invite is created in DB but failure is only logged to console. Admin has no visibility.
findings.suggested_fix: Implement retry mechanism with admin notification on failure. Add 'Resend Invite' button.
questions: Should failed invites auto-retry or require manual resend?
How many retry attempts before marking as failed?

findings.title: ip-api.com Rate Limit Risk at Scale
findings.issue: Geolocation uses ip-api.com free tier (45 req/min). At scale, this fails and ALL visitors are allowed through, bypassing blocklist.
findings.suggested_fix: Migrate to MaxMind GeoIP or implement IP lookup caching to reduce API calls.
questions: What's the budget for a paid geolocation service?
Should we cache IP lookups to reduce API calls?

findings.title: No Recording Consent Indicator for Visitors
findings.issue: Visitors are recorded with NO indication. No 'This call may be recorded' message. Compliance risk for GDPR, CCPA, two-party consent states.
findings.suggested_fix: Add visible recording indicator after call connects. Show in same location as 'Live' badge.
questions: Should the indicator be text-based or just an icon?
Should visitors be able to decline recording?

findings.title: Recording URLs Are Publicly Guessable
findings.issue: Recordings in public Supabase bucket with predictable URL patterns. Anyone who guesses the pattern can access recordings. HIPAA/GDPR risk.
findings.suggested_fix: Move to private bucket. Generate signed URLs with expiration. Add randomized UUIDs to paths.
questions: What should the signed URL expiration be? (1 hour suggested)
Do we need to migrate existing recordings?

findings.title: No ICE Restart on Connection Failure
findings.issue: When WebRTC connection fails mid-call (network glitch, NAT timeout), agent must manually end and start new call. Customer may be lost.
findings.suggested_fix: Implement ICE restart with automatic retry before showing failure state.
questions: How many auto-retry attempts before giving up?
Should we show 'Reconnecting...' status to both parties?

findings.title: Countdown Timer Mismatch with RNA Timeout
findings.issue: Incoming call modal shows hardcoded 30-second countdown, but RNA timeout fires at 15 seconds (org-configured). Agents get unexpectedly marked away.
findings.suggested_fix: Fetch org's actual RNA timeout value and use it for the countdown display.
questions: Is the RNA timeout configurable per-org in the settings UI?
Should we show a warning when less than 5 seconds remain?
